'''Rabyuna''' is a character in {{poe2}}. 

## Background

{{Description|A fire godlike woman polishes a pair of stocks, tending to them with the fondness of a mother for her favorite child.

The room is dim, illuminated only by the glow of her steel-forged skin. Her eyes burn with the light of Magran's fire. }}

Rabyuna reached her position through perseverance and effort. She teaches others the same, helping them find the strength they need to face the world as a thinking, feeling creature.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           = * Bringing [Tekēhu](/tekehu/) along results in a unique interaction.
* For {{cp2|300}} you can hire her services and receive Rabyuna's Boon (+1 [Dexterity](/dexterity/) and [Might](/might/), +2 [Resolve](/resolve/))
}}
[Category:Queen's Berth characters](/categoryQueensBerthCharacters/)
[Category:The Wild Mare characters](/categoryTheWildMareCharacters/)

'''Rabyuna''' is a character in {{poe2}}. 

==Background==
{{Description|A fire godlike woman polishes a pair of stocks, tending to them with the fondness of a mother for her favorite child.

The room is dim, illuminated only by the glow of her steel-forged skin. Her eyes burn with the light of Magran's fire. }}

Rabyuna reached her position through perseverance and effort. She teaches others the same, helping them find the strength they need to face the world as a thinking, feeling creature.
